name: Smell magic in the air. Or maybe barbecue
text: With what mingled joy and sorrow do I take up the pen to write to my dearest friend! Oh, what a change between to-day and yesterday! Now I am friendless and alone...

name: Grab your sword and fight the Horde
text: For good, too; though, in consequence of my previous emotions, I was still occasionally seized with a stormy sob . After we had jogged on for some little time, I asked the carrier...

name: We found a witch! May we burn her?
text: And she went on planning to herself how she would manage it. `They must go by the carrier,' she thought; `and how funny it'll seem, sending presents to one's own feet!...

name: For good, too though, in consequence
text: This little wandering journey, without settled place of abode, had been sounpleasant to me, that my own house, as I called it to myself, was a perfect settlement to me compared to that...

name: He made his passenger captain of one
text: Just then her head struck against the roof of the hall: in fact she was now more than nine feet high, and she at once took up the little golden key and hurried off to the garden door...

name: At first, for some time, I was notable to answer
text: This little wandering journey, without settled place of abode, had been so unpleasant to me, that my own house, as I called it to myself, was a perfect settlement to me compared to that...

text: Just then her head struck against the roof of the hall: in fact she was now more than nine feet high, and she at once took up the little golden key and hurried off to the garden door...
